project_desc: A MERN Stack web app for Connecting people with similar travel destinations and helping them collaborate.

project_title: Data Analysis on Amazon Product Listing
project_desc: Created a multi-class classifier model , which will help to classify products based on the product description given. This is intended to improve the overall search and user experience while searching for any product on an ecommerce website like Amazon.

Spam detection is a supervised machine learning problem.The dataset chosen had 30000 rows.The data was recieved in streams, the framework used for receiving and pre processing the data for training is Pyspark.

project_title: Hotel Management app using JAVA Spring boot
project_desc: Hotel management system manages and maintains the records of customers, rooms and employees in the hotel. This system is aimed to maintain the day-to-day state of admission of residents, record of employees, room details and availability.This app was built with spring boot framework and MySQL database
